Henrici has shown [ 21 ] that a complete set of solutions,  regular about the origin,  to this particular class of solutions ( which we shall here after denote by S ) is given by

One may use these facts to construct an operator which maps the class of analytic functions regular and even about the origin onto the class of solutions iS of ( 1.  1 ) considered here.  Indeed,  integral representations for the members of the system ( 2.  2 ) may be ob tained by use of a theorem of Henrici [ 21 ].
